front.title: A Uniform Resource Name (URN) Namespace for the oneM2M Partnership Project (oneM2M)

abstract.t: This document describes the Namespace Identifier (NID) for UniformResource Namespace (URN) resources published by the oneM2M PartnershipProject (oneM2M). oneM2M defines and manages resources that utilizethis URN name model. Management activities for these and otherresource types are provided by the oneM2M Secretariat.
